page.title: 06SWAFFHAM PRIOR'S CONCERT
page.content: After many weeks of rehearsal, Swaffham Prior Community Primary School held a concert in St Mary's Church in July 1985. The concert was in 2 sections and began at 7pm. The first items were given by the infants who gave a selection of singing and verses on the subject of holidays, with the sea playing a major part. The second part of the concert was given by the juniors who performed Joseph and his Amazing Technicloured Dreamcoat. This consisted of singing and dance routines and was accompanied by piano, drums, bass guitar and 2 ordinary guitars. The evening was very well supported by parents and friends and at the end a presentation was made to the music teacher. She was given a plant called Joseph's. A collection afterwards made Â£57.32 for the Ethioapian Appeal.
